October 6, 1952
Mr* Robert Hudson
119 Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbans, Illinois
Dear Bobi
Frank has mentioned to you, no doubt, that at this point
our list of prospects for the Executive Director seems to be
narrowed down to Earl Wynn. Inasmuch as you have had a number
of contacts with Earl, I should appreciate a reaction from you
concerning him* Has he performed well in the various group
meetings you have had with him? How well would he hold his
own with some of our national groups such as the American
Council? How would the Foundation people with whom you have
worked react to him, and how would he fit into the family
picture at the University of Illinois? Ttese to me are imporÂ¬
tant questions.
I will hold any comments you have concerning him in
strictest confidence*
My kindest regards*
Sincerely yours.
Grsydon Ausmus, Director
Radio Broadcasting Services
Manager, WUOA(FM)
QAtpse
